title: 'Feel like slapping them': Telangana CM's shock remark on young scribes sparks outcry
content: Telangana's Chief Minister, A Revanth Reddy, is facing backlash after criticizing young journalists for lacking respect and etiquette at an event. His remarks sparked outrage, with press associations demanding clarification. Simultaneously, Reddy criticized political parties for owning media outlets and addressed concerns about social media misinformation.

title: 'Fire vs lamp': China torches US for hypocrisy over trade with Russia
content: China has strongly refuted US accusations of supporting Russia's war efforts in Ukraine, labeling the claims as hypocritical. A Chinese representative at the UN criticized the US for its double standards, questioning why Washington can trade with Russia while restricting others. China maintains it hasn't provided lethal weapons and urged the US to cease blame-shifting and focus on ending the conflict.

title: 'ATS pressurised, evidence erased': Acquitted accused in Malegaon blast case
content: Sameer Kulkarni, acquitted in the Malegaon blast case, accuses Congress leaders and the Maharashtra ATS of framing Hindus for political gain. He alleges evidence manipulation and pressure on investigators. Retired inspector Mehiboob Mujawar supports this, claiming he was ordered to implicate RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat.

title: Amazon CEO Jassy: 'Having AI do a lot of the coding for us … allows employees to…'
content: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy has shifted his stance on AI's impact, now emphasizing its potential to enhance employee roles by automating routine tasks. This contrasts with earlier warnings of job displacement. Jassy highlighted AI's current role in coding, customer service, and business process automation, citing significant time savings.

title: IND vs ENG: Harry Brook does a Rishabh Pant - Who did it better? Watch
content: Harry Brook's audacious shot against Mohammed Siraj, reminiscent of Rishabh Pant, became the highlight of the rain-interrupted final Test. Brook's improvisational six, executed while losing balance, drew comparisons to Pant's fearless batting style. Despite India's earlier innings of 224 and England's quick start, Brook's moment of brilliance captured the attention of fans and commentators alike.

title: Where's the oil? Trump's Pak deal more strategic than realistic; move to pressure India?
content: Donald Trump's announcement of a deal to develop Pakistan's oil reserves is viewed with skepticism. Experts suggest it's a strategic move to counter China's influence and pressure India on trade, rather than a reflection of Pakistan's immediate hydrocarbon potential. The viability of these reserves remains unproven, requiring significant investment and time, especially given the risky locations.

title: Spotify playlist of Sam Altman, JD Vance and others leaked in Panama playlists
content: A new data collection called "Panama Playlists" has exposed the Spotify listening habits of prominent figures, including OpenAI's Sam Altman and Vice President JD Vance. The leaked data reveals playlists and listening patterns of politicians, tech leaders, and journalists. Anduril CEO Palmer Luckey confirmed the authenticity of his playlist, while Spotify declined to comment on the matter.

title: 'Anti-India hostility': Centre trashes 'dubious' UK report on transnational repression
content: India has vehemently refuted a British parliamentary committee report accusing it of transnational repression in the UK, dismissing the allegations as baseless. The Ministry of External Affairs stated that the report relies on dubious sources with a history of anti-India sentiment.

title: 'There can be no discussion because ... ': Rijiju rules out Parl debate on Bihar SIR
content: Union Minister Kiren Rijiju has dismissed the possibility of a parliamentary discussion on Bihar's electoral roll revision, emphasizing the Election Commission's autonomy. Opposition parties, however, allege the revision aims to disenfranchise voters, disrupting Parliament proceedings with demands for a debate.

title: Explained: Why Nifty, Sensex have closed in red for 5th week in row
content: Indian stock markets faced a fifth consecutive week of losses, driven by persistent FII selling, concerns over India-US trade negotiations, and disappointing Q1 corporate earnings. Donald Trump's tariff imposition and a strengthening US dollar further contributed to the bearish sentiment.

title: Solar Eclipse that will see 'world to go dark for six minutes' on August 2
content: Contrary to viral social media claims, the world will not experience a six-minute blackout on August 2, 2025. NASA confirms a total solar eclipse is scheduled for August 2, 2027, visible across parts of Europe, North Africa, and the Middle East.

title: Trump's 25% tariff: India expects minimal impact; agri, GM food no-go areas in trade talks
content: The US imposition of 25% tariffs is expected to have minimal impact on India, with over half of Indian exports remaining unaffected due to existing exemptions. Trade between the two nations reached $131.8 billion in fiscal year 2024-25. India remains firm on not offering duty concessions for agricultural, dairy, and GM products, citing religious sentiments.

title: WWE SmackDown preview & streaming details: Full match card, confirmed segments, start timings & more
content: WWE SmackDown, airing live from Newark on August 1, 2025, will be the go-home show for SummerSlam. The episode features a face-off between John Cena and Cody Rhodes before their title match. Giulia defends her Women's United States Championship against Zelina Vega, and Los Garza issue an open challenge.

title: On right track: Railway Protection Force gets first-ever woman DG
content: In a historic move, Sonali Mishra, a senior IPS officer, has been appointed as the Director General of the Railway Protection Force (RPF), becoming the first woman to lead the 143-year-old security force. Mishra, a 1993-batch officer, brings over 30 years of experience from various prestigious organizations.

title: Bihar SIR: Over 65 lakh voters not included in draft rolls; Patna tops list
content: Bihar's draft electoral rolls omitted over 65 lakh names after a Special Intensive Revision. Patna had the highest number of missing voters. The Election Commission released new draft rolls, allowing citizens to file claims. Opposition parties criticized the exclusions, alleging they favored the ruling NDA. Parliament saw protests and adjournment over the issue. The Supreme Court emphasized en masse inclusion.

title: IND vs ENG: 'Just bat, ball and go home?' - KL Rahul rages at umpire after Prasidh-Root spat
content: Day 2 of the India-England Test at The Oval saw heated exchanges as Prasidh Krishna and Joe Root engaged in a verbal spat, requiring umpire intervention. Shortly after, KL Rahul confronted umpire Kumar Dharmasena, questioning restrictions on player interactions. Tensions escalated post-lunch, reflecting India's aggressive approach in this crucial game.

title: Man slaps 'nervous' passenger on IndiGo flight; handed over to security - video
content: On an IndiGo Mumbai-Kolkata flight, a passenger experiencing a panic attack was assaulted by a co-traveler. The incident occurred while the aircraft was taxiing, prompting the victim to request disembarkation. IndiGo has condemned the unruly behavior, handed over the assaulter to security, and initiated actions that could lead to a no-fly list designation.

title: Happy sister's day: Best messages, quotes, wishes and images to share
content: In 1996, Tricia Eleogram and her sister established Sister's Day in Memphis, Tennessee, to celebrate the unique bond between sisters. This day encourages people to cherish their sisters and share affection. The article provides a collection of heartfelt messages, wishes, and quotes to help make Sister's Day 2025 brighter, emphasizing the importance of this special relationship.

title: IND vs ENG 5th Test: Root overtakes Tendulkar; becomes first ever to...
content: Joe Root's 29-run innings against India in the fifth Test at The Oval propelled him past Sachin Tendulkar to become the third-highest run-scorer in home Tests. Root now boasts 7,220 runs in England, surpassing Tendulkar's 7,216 in India. He also crossed 2,000 Test runs against India at home.

title: 'Ties with Russia time-tested': India brushes off Trump's penalty threat on energy imports
content: The Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) has dismissed suggestions of strained India-Russia relations following criticism from US President Donald Trump regarding their economic and strategic ties. MEA spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal emphasized that India's bilateral relationships are independent and based on national interests, highlighting the time-tested partnership with Russia and defense cooperation guided by security needs.

title: 71st National Film Awards: SRK, Massey share 'Best Actor' award
content: The 71st National Film Awards winners are out. The jury submitted the report to Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw. The announcement took place at the National Media Centre in New Delhi. Several films won awards across various categories. These include feature films in Telugu, Tamil, Punjabi, and other languages. Awards were also given for action direction, choreography, music, and more.

title: Watch: Heated exchange between Root and Krishna forces umpire intervention at The Oval
content: Tensions flared between Joe Root and Prasidh Krishna on Day 2 of the final Test at The Oval, following a heated verbal exchange that required umpire intervention. The incident punctuated a day of fluctuating fortunes, where England initially dominated, reaching 109/1 at lunch after dismissing India for 224.

title: ‘There are a lot of leaders’: Kamala Harris on who leads Democrat Party; dodges question
content: Kamala Harris, promoting her memoir about her 2024 presidential run, sidestepped Stephen Colbert's question about who leads the Democratic Party, emphasizing collective responsibility instead of naming individuals. She reflected on her public service career and the challenges of her campaign, highlighting her commitment to integrity and rule of law. Harris also addressed speculation about a potential 2028 presidential bid.

title: LeBron James’ wife reveals how her cravings during pregnancy left NBA star confused
content: Savannah James, wife of NBA star LeBron James, shared a nostalgic pregnancy story on 'Everybody's Crazy,' recalling intense cravings for chicken and JoJos during her time in Cleveland. Her unusual request and emotional reaction left LeBron bewildered but supportive, leading to a KFC run.

title: CBSE class 12 supplementary results 2025 declared
content: CBSE has announced the Class 12 Supplementary Exam Result for 2025 on August 1, accessible via official portals. Students can download provisional scorecards using their roll number, school number, and admit card ID. Marksheet distribution details are specified for regular and private candidates, and the verification process begins on August 6, 2025.

title: Triple H at White House: WWE star joins Trump to revive school fitness — what we know so far
content: Triple H joined President Donald Trump at the White House to sign an executive order reinstating the Presidential Fitness Test in schools, a program aimed at promoting youth fitness through basic exercises. He emphasized the importance of health and fitness from a young age, highlighting its role in setting individuals up for success.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy welcomes return of Presidential Fitness Test after Trump signs executive order
content: Vivek Ramaswamy lauded the revival of the Presidential Fitness Test following President Trump's executive order, framing it as a crucial step towards enhancing youth health and discipline. Ramaswamy, who advocated for the program's return as part of an education overhaul, sees it as a way to instill good health habits early on.

title: 'A head of state so volatile': Ex-PM Deve Gowda's scathing attack on Trump
content: Former Prime Minister HD Deve Gowda has strongly condemned US President Donald Trump's recent remarks describing India's economy as "dead," calling them baseless and ill-tempered. Gowda praised Prime Minister Narendra Modi for standing firm against US pressure and prioritizing India's national interests. He defended India's economic performance and criticized opposition leaders echoing Trump's sentiments.

title: Karun Nair's ex-coach on fifty: 'Wouldn't have got another chance had he failed'
content: Karun Nair's resilient 57, his first international half-century in nine years, helped India recover to 224 in the fifth Test against England after a shaky start. His former coach, Sanath Kumar, highlighted Nair's mental toughness and perseverance after being sidelined despite a prior triple century.

title: July gross GST mop-up at Rs 1.96 lakh crore; rises 7.5% YoY
content: India's GST collection witnessed a 7.5% year-on-year increase, reaching Rs 1.96 lakh crore in July 2025, driven by strong domestic revenues and increased imports. Domestic revenue grew by 6.7%, while import taxes rose by 9.5%. Net GST revenue stood at Rs 1.69 lakh crore, reflecting a modest increase, though refunds surged significantly.

title: Watch: Akash Deep animated send-off after dismissing Ben Duckett
content: Akash Deep's fiery spell halted England's explosive start at The Oval, dismissing Ben Duckett for 43. Duckett and Crawley's rapid 92-run opening stand threatened India before Akash's persistence paid off, inducing a mistimed reverse scoop. Akash's animated send-off underscored the intensity of the breakthrough, marking a personal triumph within the crucial Test match.

title: Hyundai edges ahead as Tata, Mahindra lock horns for No.3 spot: Vahan data
content: Maruti Suzuki continues its dominance in India's car market, maintaining a strong lead in July 2025 with impressive sales figures. Hyundai secured the second position for the second consecutive month, surpassing Tata Motors and Mahindra.

title: Conor McGregor breaks silence after court loss claims Nikita Hand begged for secret $3 million deal
content: Conor McGregor has denied sexually assaulting Nikita Hand, following the rejection of his appeal in a civil trial. McGregor claims Hand's team initially sought a settlement, refuting rumors of a €1 million offer from his side. He alleges that after Hand was caught lying under oath, her lawyers demanded €3 million, which he refused.

title: 'No response, no letters': EC's 5-point attack on Rahul over 'vote theft' claim
content: The Election Commission of India (ECI) has strongly refuted Rahul Gandhi's allegations of electoral misconduct, labeling them as "wild" and unsubstantiated. The ECI stated that Gandhi has not engaged with the commission despite repeated attempts at communication. Gandhi accused the ECI of complicity in "vote theft" and working for the BJP, threatening to expose their alleged actions.

title: Connor McDavid turns water baby: poolside moment with wife Lauren — before Draisaitl wedding
content: Before Leon Draisaitl's wedding, Connor McDavid's wife, Lauren, shared playful moments on Instagram, revealing a relaxed side of the Oilers' captain. Fans enjoyed seeing McDavid poolside and in a golf cart with Draisaitl and their partners. The social media snapshots highlight the close friendship between the NHL stars and their significant others, showcasing their lives beyond the ice.

title: Duckett and Crawley make history, become first opening pair to...
content: Ben Duckett and Zak Crawley's exceptional opening partnership continues to flourish, setting new records against India in Test cricket. They surpassed Greenidge and Haynes with their eighth 50-plus stand, accumulating the highest runs for an England opening pair against India.

title: Rape case: How Prajwal Revanna reacted in court after conviction
content: Prajwal Revanna, grandson of former Prime Minister H.D. Deve Gowda, was convicted Friday in Bengaluru in a rape case involving a domestic help. The special court found him guilty of raping the woman at his farmhouse in 2021, acts allegedly recorded on his phone.

title: Charles wept over Camilla night before marrying Diana, insiders share details
content: King Charles and Princess Diana's wedding, though seemingly a fairy tale, was fraught with heartache. Both reportedly cried the night before, Charles due to his lingering love for Camilla, whom he honored with cufflinks, and Diana due to her own reservations. The marriage was further strained by Camilla's continued presence and Diana's struggles, casting a shadow over their union from the start.

title: 'He's not a child': Rijiju attacks Rahul's 'anti-India' stance
content: Parliamentary Affairs Minister Kiren Rijiju criticized Rahul Gandhi for echoing Donald Trump's "dead economy" remarks, deeming it an "anti-India" stance. Rijiju urged Gandhi to act with the dignity expected of an opposition leader, rather than attacking the government. Gandhi had listed reasons for India's economic decline, blaming Modi's policies and alleging favoritism towards Adani.

title: Solak's annual ranking of all 32 NFL coaching staffs: A new No. 1 and No. 32 ahead of the season
content: We used past performance, future expectations, in-game decision-making and more to rank coaching staffs.

title: Wrigley Field chosen to host 2027 All-Star Game
content: The  Cubs and Wrigley Field will host the 2027 MLB All-Star Game. It will be the fourth time Wrigley has held the game and the first since 1990.

title: Braves explode for 8, then allow 8 in historic inning
content: The Braves and Reds combined for 16 runs on 16 hits in the eighth inning, marking just the third time in MLB history that both teams scored eight or more runs in the same inning.

title: Gaudreau Family 5K raises $500K for playground
content: The first 5K held in the memory of John and Matthew Gaudreau helped raise more than $500,000, enough to break ground later this year on an accessible playground at the special education school where the hockey players' mother works.

title: Ex-Finals MVP Meesseman to make Liberty debut
content: Newly signed Emma Meesseeman will make her Liberty debut Friday against the Sun. Meesseman has not played in the WNBA since 2022 but helped Belgium win the EuroBasket title last month.

title: Sources: Newcastle rejects Liverpool's Isak bid
content: Liverpool have seen a bid for striker Alexander Isak rejected by Newcastle United, sources have told ESPN, with the offer well below the £150 million asking price.

title: Knicks, Bridges agree to 4-year, $150M extension
content: Knicks forward Mikal Bridges has agreed to a four-year, $150 million contract extension with the franchise, his agents told ESPN's Shams Charania.

title: 🏈 Fantasy FB Do Not Draft list: CMC and more
content: The annual hit is back, with players Eric Karabell feels are going earlier than they should in drafts this summer.

title: The Terry McLaurin trade request, explained: Why it could linger, and which teams should be interested
content: The Commanders' star wide receiver wants a new extension -- or a new team.  Can they justify paying him? And what could they get if they dealt him?

title: NBA fact or fiction: Was Draymond right about the end of free agency?
content: Did the CBA ruin NBA free agency? Bobby Marks plays "fact or fiction" with some of the offseason's most impactful trends.

title: Who makes the Year 2 leap? The top 10 sophomores to watch for the 2025-26 season
content: From top 10 picks to Year 1 breakouts, who are the most interesting players to watch in their sophomore season?

title: MLB Power Rankings: Where every team stands post-trade deadline
content: There was a lot of action across baseball ahead of Thursday's trade deadline. How did the moves impact each club's standing?

title: The 7 biggest surprises and disappointments of the WNBA season
content: From the Valkyries surpassing expectations to the Aces falling short on theirs, here's what we didn't see coming.

title: Man United will never win the Premier League with their poor approach to transfers
content: After finishing 15th in the Premier League last season, Man United are still a mess and their recent transfers show they haven't wised up.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Real Madrid face striker dilemma over Mbappé backup
content: Real Madrid are facing a choice over whether to keep Endrick and Gonzalo García for next season. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: What we're hearing in the transfer window: Arsenal still open to Eze deal
content: The summer transfer window is open, but what are our reporters hearing about deals that could get done?

title: Lapsed fan's guide to 2025 SummerSlam: Two-nighter has something for everyone
content: Our FAQ guide on the latest WWE storylines, including John Cena's final SummerSlam and Jelly Roll's debut.

title: It's time for The Ocho! Check out the 2025 schedule, plus how to watch every event
content: It's time for the 2025 edition of The Ocho! Check out how to watch T-Rex races, paintball, dog surfing and more alternative events on ESPN now.

title: Red Sox add to staff, acquire May from Dodgers
content: The Red Sox acquired starter Dustin May from the Dodgers on Thursday, filling their need for pitching help. Los Angeles received outfield prospect James Tibbs III in return.

title: Rangers get Kelly from D-backs to add to rotation
content: The Rangers are acquiring right-handed starting pitcher Merrill Kelly from the Diamondbacks in exchange for three pitchers, sources told ESPN.

title: Rays add White Sox's Houser, Twins' Jax to staff
content: Adrian Houser, who was released by the Rangers and has shined since being picked up by the White Sox, has now been traded to the Rays, who also picked up Griffin Jax from the Twins for Taj Bradley.

title: Phillies fill outfield need, get Bader from Twins
content: The Phillies filled a need in their outfield by acquiring 2021 Gold Glove-winner Harrison Bader from the Twins.

title: Padres acquire closer Miller, lefty Sears from A's
content: The San Diego Padres have acquired Mason Miller in a trade with the Athletics, adding the hard-throwing reliever to their already talented bullpen.

title: Mariners land slugging 3B Suarez from D-backs
content: The Mariners have acquired slugging third baseman Eugenio Suárez from the Diamondbacks in exchange for three prospects.

title: Cubs add righty Soroka, send 2 prospects to Nats
content: The Cubs acquired pitcher Mike Soroka from the Nationals for two prospects and reliever Andrew Kittredge from the Orioles for another prospect.

title: What to know about the 2025 PFL welterweight and featherweight finals
content: Three weeks of PFL World Championships finals begin Friday with Thad Jean vs. Logan Storley and Jesus Pinedo vs. Movlid Khaybulaev.

title: Expert picks, best bets: How Taira can avoid an upset loss at UFC Fight Night
content: Din Thomas makes his pick for Taira vs. Park and a betting insider finds value bets on this weekend's MMA cards.

title: New Hall of Famer Antonio Gates was a beloved teammate, remains a San Diego legend
content: Gates transformed the tight end position, and he remains remarkable to those who witnessed his exploits.

title: 'Some coaches have no idea': The uncertainties of recruiting in the new rev-share era
content: The uncertainty surrounding how programs will pay players is directly affecting the timeline for high school prospects.

title: Christian Pulisic and Puma launch 'Never Stop' cleats
content: The AC Milan star and USMNT captain teams up with Puma for a fresh drop featuring new cleats ahead of the new season.

title: What to know ahead of the Hungarian Grand Prix
content: Formula 1 heads to Budapest for round 14 of the 2025 season. Find out the stats, session times and predictions for the last race weekend before the summer break.

title: Week 10 preview: Key stats, players for Outlaws homecoming
content: The PLL heads to Denver, with two games for the league's top team. Here's the schedule, key stats, injury notes, more.

title: South Carolina to Illinois: SportsCenter's 50-in-50 Week 6 quiz
content: From Florida to North Carolina, the "SportsCenter" 50 state tour continues. We're back for our penultimate quiz of the summer.

title: How billionaire Mike Repole plans to change the vibe of the UFL, expand it to 16 teams
content: MIke Repole is taking over business operations for the UFL and promises market changes and a livelier product.

title: Passenger assaults co-traveller on IndiGo aircraft
content: The commotion happened as the passenger onboard Mumbai-Kolkata flight reported discomfort possibly due to a panic attack and requested to be deboarded leading to protests from others as it would cause a delay

title: No need for Karnataka to give land for cheap to IT firms: Priyank Kharge
content: The State’s IT Minister said that the government was promoting schemes to upskill talent, and that Karnataka benefited from early investments in the IT sector.

title: Tamil Nadu govt. urges Madras HC to exempt ‘Ungaludan Stalin’ and ‘Nalam Kaakum Stalin’ schemes from prohibitory order
content: Files a modification petition urging the first Division Bench to clarify that its interim order will not be applicable to these two schemes

title: Encounters breaks out in J&K’s Kulgam
content: The encounter in Kashmir’s Kulgam comes just days after the security forces killed all the three terrorists involved in the Pahalgam terror attack in an encounter at Srinagar’s Dachigam area.

title: Bangladesh envoy arrives in Tripura on three-day visit
content: Bangladesh High Commissioner visits Tripura, meets officials, inspects infrastructure projects, including Agartala-Akhaura rail link and Maitri Setu

title: SI, two constables arrested under POCSO Act in 2023 dismissed from service
content: Four police personnel reached Mukkombu in a car in plainclothes and consumed liquor and they spotted a 17-year-old girl with a 19-year-old youth and threatened them

title: Bihar draft electoral rolls published by ECI include 7.24 crore names, showing a drop of 65 lakh voters
content: Patna draft roll has 3.94 lakh fewer voters than the list from January 2025; many of those on the draft list are yet to submit required documents and may be deprived of voting rights, say INDIA bloc leaders

title: PM Modi to visit Varanasi on August 2, inaugurate many infra projects
content: PM Modi to inaugurate projects worth ₹2,200 crore in Varanasi, release PM Kisan Samman Nidhi, and address public meeting

title: Award for The Kerala Story invites a storm of criticism
content: Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan says the jury has insulted the noble tradition of Indian cinema that stood for religious brotherhood and national integration by awarding a film that was built on lies to defame Kerala and spread communalism

title: Banakacherla: BRS blames Congress, BJP ‘silence’ for AP going ahead
content: Harish Rao suggests AP to agree for Telangana’s rightful share in Krishna, Godavari waters before seeking its nod for PBLP

title: RTC workers to go on indefinite strike from August 5
content: The JAC, which represents employees of all four State-run transport corporations, has demanded a salary hike effective from January 1, 2024, and the settlement of pending arrears for 38 months from January 1, 2020, to February 28, 2023.

title: It may take one year to get death certificate of youths killed in Russia-Ukraine war
content: 13 Indian nationals recruited by Russia as mercenaries in the war with Ukraine remain in the Russian armed forces

title: Indian Navy’s Eastern Fleet arrives in Manila to bolster Indo-Pacific ties
content: The visits reaffirms the strategic importance of the event and the high-level engagement with the Philippine Navy, representing India’s maritime outreach in the region

title: Reservoirs across Andhra Pradesh brimming, Nagarjuna Sagar is 95% full
content: Hydropower generation has been stepped up significantly, authorities monitoring closely the inflows and the safety of reservoirs

title: Knowledge gained at ISS is going to be useful for our Gaganyaan mission: Group Captain Shukla
content: Group Captain Shukla, who is one of the four astronauts selected for the Gaganyaan mission, shares the highlights of the Ax-4 mission for the first time after returning to Earth

title: Health Minister hints at equipment going missing from Urology department
content: Show-cause notice issued to Haris Chirakkal was just a routine matter of procedure and not intended to be a vengeful action specifically against him, says Veena George

title: CM announces revival of Gandikota Festival; slated for December 26, 27
content: The region reckoned as ‘Grand Canyon of India’ will be developed as an anchor tourist hub, says Chandrababu Naidu

title: CPI(M) urges NIA to appeal against acquittal of Malegaon blasts case accused
content: The CPI(M) Polit Bureau says it was yet another case of undue delay and eventual denial of justice to the victims of a terrorist act by an extremist Hindutva group

title: Malayalam cinema wins four honours at National Film Awards; Urvashi and Vijayaraghavan get best supporting actor awards
content: Urvashi wins the best supporting actor (female) for her performance in Ullozhukku and Vijayaraghavan wins the award for the best supporting actor (male) for Pookkaalam, although technically both of them played the lead roles in these films

title: Chemists’ body seeks action against startups for unauthorised tampering, repacking of medicine strips
content: ‘Such tampering and repacking of medicine strips threaten patient safety, undermine ethical pharmacy practices, and erode confidence in the regulatory framework.’

title: Controversy breaks out in Maharashtra after ex-policeman claims he was asked to pick up Mohan Bhagwat over 2008 Malegaon blast case
content: Mehboob Mujawar, a former policeman who had worked in the Maharashtra Anti-Terrorism Squad (ATS), said he was pressured to arrest the RSS chief on directions from IPS officer Parambir Singh and other higher officials

title:
Andhra Pradesh to become single-use plastic-free by June 2026; 
Secretariat to set the example from this I-Day
content: Government will ban plastic bottles, cups, plates, sachets, stickers, and carry bags in the Secretariat and replace them with eco-friendly alternatives, says official

title: BJP Rajya Sabha Tally Crosses 100 For First Time Since 2022
content: In a boost for the ruling BJP, the party has crossed the 100 mark in the Rajya Sabha for the first time since April 2022, with three nominated members joining the party.

title: Meghalaya's Conrad Sangma Calls For Release of Arrested Kerala Nuns
content: Two nuns, along with another person Sukhman Mandavi, were arrested on charges of them of forcibly converting three women and trafficking them.

title: Israeli Hostage Shown Gaza Starvation Footage, Palestinian Islamic Jihad Releases Video
content: The Palestinian Islamic Jihad terror group on Thursday posted a video of an Israeli-German hostage - Rom Braslavski, who had been held captive in the Gaza Strip in October 2023, an attack after which war sparked in the territory.

title: "Gravely Insulted": P Vijayan On National Award For 'The Kerala Story'
content: Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan has alleged the Centre is spreading misinformation by honouring a film that he claimed tarnished the Left-ruled state's image, hours after 'The Kerala Story' won two major titles at the 71st National Film Awards

title: "Big Headload Fell...": Railway Minister On What Led To Delhi Station Tragedy
content: A big headload that "fell from one of the passengers" led to the tragedy at New Delhi Railway Station that killed 18 people, Union Railway Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said today in response to a member's query.

title: Mule Accounts, Kickbacks: Raids Find Rs 1,000-Crore Trail Behind Cattle Scheme
content: Illegal payments and kickbacks to government officials were part of the Rs 1,000 crore money trail uncovered following raids by the Enforcement Directorate in Hyderabad in connection with the TelanganaSheep Rearing Development Scheme.

title: Lalit Modi Posts New Photos Of Him And Vijay Mallya - This Time At Oval
content: Fugitive billionaires Lalit Modi and Vijay Mallya have now shared photos of them enjoying the India-England test match at the Oval in London.

title: Gang Runs Fake Tirumala Temple, Resort Booking Websites, Loots Visitors
content: The Bapatla district police in Andhra Pradesh have arrested a pan-India gang from Rajasthan responsible for creating fraudulent websites that mimicked popular tourism and temple booking portals.

title: India Flags "Inadvertent Air Violation" By Bangladesh Airline In June
content: India has raised an instance of "inadvertent air violation" by a Bangladesh domestic airline in June, so that steps are taken to prevent recurrence of such instances, the government informed Parliament on Friday.

title: US Promises Gaza Food Plan After Envoy Visit
content: President Donald Trump's special envoy promised a plan to deliver more food to Gaza after inspecting a US-backed distribution centre, as the UN human rights office said Israeli forces had killed hundreds of hungry Palestinians waiting for aid.

title: Bombay High Court To Get New Bench In Kolhapur From August 18
content: The Bombay High Court will get a new bench at Kolhapur district in western Maharashtra, which will be the fourth HC bench in the state, and its sittings will commence from August 18.

title: Lookout Notice Against Anil Ambani In Rs 3,000-Crore Loan Fraud Case: Sources
content: In more trouble for Reliance Group Chairman Anil Ambani, the Enforcement Directorate has issued a Look Out Circular against him in connection with the alleged Rs 3,000-crore loan fraud case, sources said on Friday.

title: "We Continue To Closely Follow The Matter": India on Nimisha Priya Case
content: India on Friday said it continues to render all possible assistance in the case of Nimisha Priya, an Indian nurse on death row in Yemen.

title: She Married 8 Men, Extorted Lakhs. Caught While Marrying For The 9th Time
content: A shocking incident has come to light from Nagpur, Maharashtra, where the police have arrested a 'looteri dulhan' (con bride) who allegedly married not one or two, but eight men, one after the other, and extorted lakhs of rupees from them.

title: London-Delhi Air India Flight Delayed For Over 11 Hours
content: Air India's flight from London to the national capital on Friday was delayed by more than 11 hours and will now depart on Saturday morning.

title: Puerto Rico Nightclub Shooting Leaves 1 Teen Dead, 5 People Wounded
content: A nightclub shooting in western Puerto Rico early Friday left one teenager dead and five other people wounded, including two women in serious condition, authorities said.

title: "Baseless": Deve Gowda Slams Trump Over "Dead Economy" Remark On India
content: Former Prime Minister and JD-S Rajya Sabha member H.D. Deve Gowda said that "even a small trader and a poor farmer in India, who conducts his business with great dignity, integrity and humanity, can teach many lessons to Mr. Trump".

title: Putin Says Wants Lasting Peace In Ukraine
content: Russia wants a "lasting and stable peace" in Ukraine, President Vladimir Putin said, adding that Moscow's conditions for peace remained unchanged as Kyiv repeated its call for a leaders' meeting.

title: McDonald's Bets On India As It Doubles Down On AI Investment By 2027
content: McDonald's plans to "double down" on its artificial intelligence investment by 2027 and is betting on India as a key hub for data governance, engineering and platform architecture.

title: Spain Air-Drops 12 Tonnes Of Food Aid Over Gaza
content: Spain said it had air-dropped 12 tonnes of food into Gaza, which UN-backed experts say is slipping into famine.

title: Disquiet continues at Kerala University as V-C dissolves meeting over Registrar’s presence
content: Vice-Chancellor in-charge Mohanan Kunnummal abruptly ends meeting over the presence of suspended Registrar  K.S. Anil Kumar and Syndicate members J.S. Shijukhan and R. Rajesh, sparking heated arguments and disruptions.

title: Trellis-based horticulture gains ground in Kollidam block
content: As part of the programme, intercropping is encouraged with farmers cultivating bitter gourd, snake gourd, and ribbed gourd on trellis structures alongside crops like chilli and jasmine in flood-prone areas

title: Bamboo on your plate: KFRI brings a nutritious forest treasure to everyday diet
content: Bamboo shoot-based flakes and powder developed by Kerala Forest Research Institute aims to revolutionise healthy eating and rural livelihoods

title: Prajwal judgment has boosted the morale of survivors, say activists
content: The verdict has shown that law is the same for all and when implemented with the same spirit, justice is possible, said an activist

title: CM inaugurates revamped Muthukuda beach with boating facility and a TTDC restaurant
content: A slew of infrastructure facilities such as boathouse, visitor’s hall, sanitation complex, vehicle parking lot to attract tourists has been created at a cost of ₹ 3.06 crore

title: Leopard mauls sleeping tribal child in Malakkappara
content: Quick action by family saves boy’s life; family lives in a makeshift hut after the 2018 floods destroyed their house

title: Five members of cybercrime gang nabbed by Anantapur police; ₹42 lakh cash seized
content: Scam operated via fake investment apps from Cambodia; gang routed victim’s ₹1.73 crore through 13 fake bank accounts and cryptocurrency channels, says SP

title: Tube Investments posts lower Q1 consolidated net profit, as costs surge
content: Tube Investments of India Ltd. (TII) of the Murugappa Group, reported first quarter consolidated net profit attributed to owners of the company of ₹198.97 crore, when compared to ₹226.80 crore in the same period last year.

title: Government schools in Tiruchi record increase in Class I admissions
content: Tiruchi stands third among the districts which have the highest enrolment in Class I in government schools this academic year in the State where the figure has crossed 4 lakh

title: R&B Minister calls for completion of road works in Chittoor within six months
content: B.C. Janardhan Reddy urges speedy tender process; stresses on quality, inter-State connectivity, and transparency in execution

title: Entire country fights a war, says Rajnath, seeks civil-military synergy
content: The Minister said the “exceptional back-end support” provided by different departments of the Ministry of Defence to the Armed Forces was key to the success of Operation Sindoor

title: Protests over continued incarceration of nuns in Chhattisgarh rock Kerala
content: Archbishop Pamplany seeks immediate intervention of the Union government. Protests held in Kannur, Kollam, Kozhikode, and Malappuram

title: ‘Scorpion sitting on a Shivling’ remark: ‘Why so touchy’, Supreme Court asks man who filed defamation complaint against Shashi Tharoor
content: The apex court extended the stay on defamation proceedings against the Congress MP in the trial court

title: Madras High Court quashes Government Order cancelling allotment of Kalaignarin Kanavu Illam houses to Maraimalai Ilakkuvanar and Thilagavathy
content: Justice N. Anand Venkatesh rules that a 2024 government decision modifying the eligibility criteria cannot be given effect to retrospectively

title: Chandrababu Naidu vows to ‘drive’ State towards prosperity
content: Chief Minister distributes pensions to the tune of ₹43.4 crore to 1.08 lakh widows; says they were left out by the previous regime

title: CPI(M) announces State-wide protests against the arrest of Kerala nuns in BJP-ruled Chhattisgarh
content: The Sangh Parivar has sent a chilling message to Christians that their right to religious freedom and freedom of movement will soon be forfeit, and they will be relegated to subaltern status in a Hindu-majoritarian State, the glad-handing of Church leaders by BJP leaders in Kerala notwithstanding, he said.

title: Shift in school vacation timings requires Kerala Education Rules’ amendment
content: The move requires careful consideration, discussion and planning as several entrance examinations, such as NEET, JEE, and CUET that are held in these months. Students also take admission to institutions in other States during this period.

title: Two accused in Diya Krishna embezzlement case surrenders at Crime Branch office
content: This comes following a Kerala High Court directive after it rejected their anticipatory bail plea. Another accused remains absconding.

title: CM Himanta Biswa Sarma agrees to TTD’s request for land for temple in Assam
content: A team led by B.R. Naidu, the chairman of Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams, met Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma on Friday, August 1, 2025.

title: 4 people killed in elephant attacks in Chhattisgarh; 3 held after jumbo dies of electrocution
content: During interrogation, three men told forest officials they had illegally laid an electric wires to operate a borewell

title: 23 years on, six forest officials await justice in Mathikettan issue
content: Their plight came to the fore after the recent demise of V.S. Achuthanandan who had spearheaded the campaign to rid Mathikettan Shola of encroachers. Six Forest officials were suspended in 2002 for a year and a half, citing support to encroachers. Though a Vigilance court acquitted them in 2024, their service benefits are yet to be restored

title: Amid racial attacks, India issues advisory for its citizens in Ireland

title: Close call: Two coaches of Sabarmati Express derail; passengers safe
content: When he's not chasing stories, you’ll likely find him exploring food lanes, indulging in mutton delicacies and sundaes. title: Stanford hires former Nike CEO Donahoe as AD

title: Latest news, buzz from all 32 NFL training camps: Jags' Thomas, Lawrence working on connection
content: training camps have kicked off around the NFL, and our 32 team reporters are on the ground each day following all the action . the latest intel on standouts, highlights, position battles, depth chart movement, cut decisions and, of course, the quarterback room .

title: Former Cubs outfielder Matt Szczur pays tribute to Ryne Sandberg with painting
content: former Chicago Cubs outfielder Matt Szczur paid homage to team icon Ryne Sandberg . his most recent project was a tribute to a Hall of Famer who died on Monday at 65 . he has built up a following on Instagram and TikTok (19,200 followers)

title: Liverpool look ready to defend Premier League title with new home, away kits
content: two of their 2025-26 jerseys officially unveiled at anfield on friday . this is the third time that the reds have partnered with the german sportswear giants in their history . the first home kit of this new era is very much classic fare .

title: Mets find CF fix, trade for Orioles veteran Mullins
content: the Mets acquired center fielder cedric Mullins from the Baltimore Orioles . the 30-year-old is set to be a free agent after this season . he's hitting .229 with 15 home runs and a .738 OPS in 91 games for Baltimore .

title: Schedule superlatives: The toughest, easiest and most interesting matchups of 2025
content: college football is for the first time in history sharing revenue with athletes . the start of the 2025 season is less than a month away . it's time to hand out some superlatives, some flattering and some not so flattering .

title: Source: Commanders' McLaurin requests trade
content: source: there has been no movement toward a new deal, one source says . the wide receiver was frustrated with negotiations on a contract extension . he was placed on the physically unable to perform list with an apparent ankle injury last season .

title: MLB trade deadline winners and losers: What we loved -- and don't understand
content: this year's deadline didn't have star players on the move, like Juan Soto in 2022, or the volume of last year . we did have two shocking trades: the Astros brought back former star Carlos Correa . the Athletics traded closer Mason Miller to the Padres for leo de Vries .

title: What were the Twins thinking? Who is MLB's team to beat? Making sense of the trade deadline's biggest surprises
content: the 2025 trade deadline is in the books . the San Diego Padres and Houston Astros made surprising moves that rocked the deadline . ESPN experts debate what's real moving forward . it's not because they're all sleeping giants .
